episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4001_1:
I hereby present to you Pasio’s two new
Neo Champions!

They did an excellent job demonstrating this
round’s judging criteria—the ultimate
sync moves!

You two are like the sun and moon when
you stand side by side like that!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/6801_1:
We’ll keep challenging ourselves and
journey on even after becoming
Neo Champions!

Let’s shine brightly at full power with our
Necrozma...

and give everyone on Pasio a boost of
energy with our light!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4003_1:
These two oddly colored fusions
of Necrozma...

It’s like we’re no match for them, even with
Legendary Pokémon on our side.

Even with my own Necrozma, we can’t win
if we’re outnumbered...
Mother, at this rate...
Hey, everyone!
Sorry we’re late!
Oh, hey! Elio! Selene! You made it!
Watch out for those Necrozma!

They ain’t messin’ around... We can’t just
beat ’em down like we normally would!
We tried battling them, but we all lost.

Then let’s try something besides beating them
in battle!
You got something in mind?

I think they’re going wild because they’re
in search of light, just like Lusamine’s
Necrozma was.

So, maybe they’ll calm down if we give
them light from our sync moves!
But, Elio... Selene...

We’ve already used our sync moves multiple
times, and that includes my mother’s
Necrozma.

If that’s not enough light, then just how much
is it going to take?
Now’s not the time to be discouraged!

We need to calm those Necrozma down by
showing them that there’s an incredible
amount of light here!
Besides, don’t forget...

We still have so many friends—our
Pokémon—by our side!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4004_1: So, everyone! Help us out one more time!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4005_1:
(That flash just now... How’d we see it from
this far away?!)
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4006_1:
What gave me the idea of hosting this Neo
Champion Stadium...
was that light I saw shining at full power!

I’d like to take a moment to thank you,
Lance, for turning my wish into reality!

I’m really glad I accepted your idea
too, Professor Kukui!

These two satisfied their Necrozma’s
need for light and refined their moves
by battling each other...

So in just a short time they learned new
sync moves that shine even brighter!

It was indeed a battle that lives up to the
name of the new Neo Champions!

Now, let’s acknowledge these two for the
bright, everlasting courage and kindness they
used to form sync pairs with Necrozma...

and give them a round of applause for
demonstrating the ultimate sync moves!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4007_1:
But this is just the beginning. The real
challenge starts now!

After all, the role of a Neo Champion is to
set an example for everyone to
measure up to, right?

Just because we’ve become Neo Champions
doesn’t mean our work ends here!

Besides, you two are Pasio’s first Neo
Champions from Alola.

I’m sure everyone’s eager to see what kind
of new energy you’ll bring to Pasio—
it’ll be like a breath of fresh air!
Sounds like everyone has high hopes for us!

For our first job, I want to do something
only we can do.

Remember how when we first arrived
on Pasio...

Mallow and the others hosted island
challenge–style trials on Pasio for us?

How about we host something like that—
but on a much larger scale?
Yeah, I’d love to try that!

Sounds like a great event to get everyone on
Pasio excited while helping them learn more
about the culture of Alola!

If we’re doing this on a larger scale this
time, we should talk to Lear!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4008_1:
Elio and Selene went around to ask other
Trainers from Alola for help.

Hey, everyone! Got a minute? So, here’s
the thing...
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4011_1:
As Pasio’s Neo Champions, we’d like
to host...

Similar to the island challenge in Alola, you’ll
collect four stamps from trials in various
areas on Pasio and beat the Elite Four.

And if you can beat us, your final
opponents...

...with our authority as Neo Champions,
we’ll enter you in the Hall of Fame!

By participating in this event, we hope you
can all experience and learn more about
the culture of Alola!
Oh yeah, one more important thing!

We’d like for you to partner up and
participate as a team!

Considering how our Necrozma were formed
by two Pokémon fusing together...

we’d like for you to remember how
important—and fun—working together
can be!

Of course, the two of us will battle
as a team, too!

We’re excited to see you go all out with
your sync moves!
We hope to see you there!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4012_1: The day of the Pasio Island Challenge...

I’ve placed Pasio stickers in various
areas on Pasio to help you with your
island challenge!

If you search for and collect these stickers,
you will quite naturally progress along
your island challenge!
All right! Let’s collect them all!

Are you here to cause trouble like you did
in Alola?

That’s right, we’re gonna be pests!
But we’re legit Pasio-certified this time!

We’ll be dishin’ out all sorts of interference
while you do your island challenge! Good
luck dealing with us!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4013_1:
I wonder what kind of Pokémon will be
lured here when they get a whiff of
this dish.
Hehe, I’m looking forward to it!

Hmm... Something seems off about one
of them.
A Pinsir was stuck to it!
OK, in that case... Go, Scyther!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4014_1:
Battles are clashes of our fiery spirits!
We’ll give you a battle that’s BURNING hot!

That’s fine, but try not to burn out on us
again, will you? You’re just going to get in
the way.

Wa ha ha! What a passionate pair of
challengers!

So, here you are. Why don’t we see who
the winds favor today—you...or us?
Goodness... This sandstorm sure is a bother.

I suppose it’s time for me to step up for
the team.

Huh. I didn’t think you two would get along,
but I’m surprised by your teamwork.

Covering for each other is yet another
great aspect of battling as partners!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4015_1:
Didn’t think our weather change would be
used against us!
Yeah... Think we messed up our strategy?
So far, it’s all going according to our plan!

Let’s battle this out and see if your plan can
produce better results than ours!

Step it up, Uncle! What else did you come
here for, if you’re not gonna give it your all?
Serious battles aren’t really my style...
but I guess I have no choice.
I’m an Island Kahuna, after all.

his eyes sparkled like a Persian as he stared
down his challengers...”

If this were a scene in a novel, we would’ve
nearly reached its thrilling climax.

Let us fight through this trial as if we’re the
heroes of this story!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4016_1:
The first pair of challengers to complete
all the trials will be arriving soon.

We came to challenge you as soon as we
could!
Are we the first ones here?
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4017_1:
So our first challengers are two
Champion-ranked Trainers from the
Paldea region, huh...
I can’t wait any longer! Let’s get right into it!

Elio and Selene are challenged by Champion
Nemona and Juliana!
All right! Time to go all out with our attacks!

I can see why you two were the first to
make it through all the trials!

This is amazing! My excitement for this battle
is ripening quick!
But that was SO much fun!

We’ll definitely be back to challenge you
two again!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4018_1: Curiosity’s a must in the Survey Corps.

So I’m always on the lookout for new
experiences!

I’m looking forward to battling you so I can
understand my Pokémon better!

Elio and Selene are challenged by Galaxy
Team Survey Corps members Rei and Akari!

Akari! I’ll have Decidueye distract them
with movement!

Have Samurott attack when they’re
caught off guard!

Hisuian Decidueye battle in a totally
different way!

They’ve combined their individual battle
styles with impeccable teamwork. What a
tough opponent!
Let’s fight back using our own teamwork!

Is this the power of the Pokémon that
devour light?!

They might be stronger than any of the noble
Pokémon we battled in Hisui!

So close... We were just one step away
from winning!

Let’s come back to battle again if we get
another chance!

We had a lot of fun battling against your
Hisuian Pokémon, too!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4019_1: You’re finally here!
Hau! Gladion!
Hmph... Sorry to make you wait.

We wanted to have a serious battle with
you two, you know?
So, Gladion and I took our time to train.

You two are probably feeling a little more
comfortable as Neo Champions now, right?
Heheh, I think so!

Yeah! Today, I’m feeling stronger than
I’ve ever felt!
Good.

Just use your best moves and we’ll see
who’s left standing at the end, right?
Yeah!

I’m not giving up until I overcome the
obstacle that’s staring me right in the face!

Elio and Selene are challenged by Pokémon
Trainers Hau and Gladion!

Stay sharp, Hau. You’re the only one I can
rely on right now.

Right back at ya, Gladion! Don’t get KO’d
before me, OK?

We’re gonna bring out all the strength
we have!

And go all out to make memories that
shine bright!
Let’s battle all out! Seriously!
This battle’s for you, Tapu Koko!

Magearna! Let’s battle in sync with Hau and
our guardian deity!
Elio! Selene! Feel the light of our souls!
Whoa! Necrozma?!

I can’t believe you made these two flinch
with that light... Incredible!
But...
They endured it!
Now it’s our turn, Hau and Gladion!

Right up here in this spot on Pasio, as
close as we could get to the sun
and moon...

...is where we’ll send this full-powered
shining light all the way up to the sky!

Seriously! This is really frustrating, you
know? I seriously tried my hardest,
you know?

But at least I had a blast going all out
against you.

Phew... I’ll be back. You can count on that,
Neo Champions!
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4020_1:
Thanks so much for participating today,
everyone!

Elio and Selene’s first job as
Neo Champions—the Pasio Island
Challenge—was a success.
episode_event_ch0122_90_ch0123_90/4021_1:
Everyone from Alola who helped out had fun
celebrating to their hearts’ content at
the party.

Thanks to you all, the event turned out to be
so much fun!
I hope everyone on Pasio enjoyed it, too.

For sure! I’m sure it turned out to be a
fantastic day for them.

The participants were all smiles, including
myself!
Really? I’m so happy to hear that!
It wasn’t easy, but I’m glad we did it!
Oh? Already thinking of the next thing?

After doing this Pasio Island Challenge,
I have so many more things I want to do.
Besides...

our journey as Neo Champions has only
just begun!
